general.introduction: Next ‘17 will be the largest event in Google’s history. Google Cloud engineers, customers and partners will gather for inspiration and hands on experiences with tools, technologies and services born in the Cloud, including the latest developments from Google Cloud Platform, G Suite, Maps and Devices.

location.address: Google Malaysia, Axiata Tower (Quill 7), 9, Jalan Stesen Sentral 5, Kuala Lumpur Sentral, 50470 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur

agenda.title: Intro to Google Developer Group Kuala Lumpur
agenda.speaker: Henry Lim

agenda.title: Multiplying the Power of Firebase Storage
agenda.speaker: Jirawat Karanwittayakarn

agenda.title: Data Science on Google Cloud Platform
agenda.speaker: Ta Virot Chiraphadhanakul

agenda.title: IOT with Cloud Functions for Firebase
agenda.speaker: Lim Shang Yi

bok.name: Bok Thye Yeow
bok.position: Google Developer Relations APAC Program Manager Regional Lead (MY), Google
bok.desc: Bok Thye Yeow is a Google Developer Relations Program Manager and have more than a decade of experience developing full stack software solutions across various industries including telco, banking, digital and creative advertising, retail, etc. During his free time, he likes to experiment with new technology or taking his road bike out for a spin. He strongly believe we are only starting to scratch the surface of what's possible with technology in this era and is looking forward to the 'next big thing' to come!

vin.name: Vin Lim
vin.desc: Vin is the co-founder & CEO of Green Room - leading mobile apps & web development company, with portfolio covering major international & local brands. He is a self-thought programmer with focus on JavaScript and HTML5. His enthusiasm in building tech community led to the founding of Startup Penang with fellow startups in the region in 2012. He also co-founded Google Developers Group George Town in 2014. During the same year, he organized Google DevFest George Town which saw over 700 participants. DevFest has gone on for 3 consecutive yeas now, further fuelling the startup bloom in northern region.

jirawat.name: Jirawat Karanwittayakarn
jirawat.position: Mobile App Development Team Lead, Ascend Group
jirawat.desc: Jirawat is a Google Developer Expert in Firebase. He currently works at Ascend Group, as a Mobile App Development Team Lead. Since discovering Firebase, he has spent most of his time learning about Firebase. Jirawat lives in Bangkok, Thailand where he is actively involved in the local Firebase community such as speaking at conferences, writing blog posts and creating code samples all over Thailand. He also founded the largest Thailand Firebase developer group with over 3500 members. Jirawat's passion is to help developers learn and adopt new mobile development methodologies and frameworks like Firebase.

ta.name: Ta Virot Chiraphadhanakul
ta.desc: Ta is a Google Developer Expert in Machine Learning (ML). Previously, he was a data scientist at Facebook HQ, where he analyzed lots of data and built / improved / evaluated various ML systems. Ta became interested in ML after working on speech recognition projects during his undergrad at Chulalongkorn University. He went on to pursue his PhD in Operations Research at MIT, where he learned the mathematics behind ML algorithms. Ta recently co-founded Skooldio, an online learning platform to help Thai people master today’s most in-demand skills. He is also a lecturer at Chulalongkorn University teaching Data Science Practicum.

limshangyi.name: Lim Shang Yi
limshangyi.desc: Shang Yi is loves what's interesting in technology. He mainly works with Java and occasionally he codes on Ionic on the weekends, sometimes a bit of electronics. Loves reading creepypastas, and cooks when he's bored.

qamra.name: Qamra Jema Khan
qamra.desc: Quant finance by day, Android by night. Qamra is passionate about coding, and is constantly challenging herself by being adventurous with code. She's always experimenting and forever curious. You can find her #geekingOutGeekingProud at www.qamracodes.com !
